name: AcShooting
description:
A 2D action and shooting game created by students.
The key is the shape of the main character! If the shape changes, the game changes too! ?
It's usually a normal side-scrolling game, but when you change its shape, it instantly transforms into a shooting game where you can move around in all directions.
Solve the stage gimmicks, defeat the enemies, and aim for the goal!

  • Single player
